definition: used as a direction in music, used chiefly as a direction or description in music, a keyboard instrument that is played by depressing keys that cause hammers to strike tuned strings and produce sounds
details:
adverb
- used as a direction in music
= synonyms: loudly
adjective
- used chiefly as a direction or description in music
= example: used chiefly as a direction or description in music
= synonyms: loud
noun
- a keyboard instrument that is played by depressing keys that cause hammers to strike tuned strings and produce sounds
= synonyms: pianoforte, forte-piano
- (music) low loudness
= synonyms: pianissimo
